content.description:
Start matched in pocket and go up.

You gotta pay the Troll’s toll to get into the starting hold.
content.location: Just to the right and behind Dan’s Problem.

content.description:
Start sitting with wide opposing sloper sidepulls. Pull off the ground with some difficulty and pop to the incut pocket. Head up and left to the arete and top out.

Difficult to find the proper starting position, but great fun once you do.
content.location: On the Dan's Problem Boulder. Starts down and left of the finish to Leviathan Hunting.

content.description: Magnificent face climbing up slightly less than vertical rock. Make sure you use the gaston edge at the top for the true top out, don't wimp out to the left.
content.location: The tall face behind the pine tree that you pass on the way to the Jacked and Tan boulder. Hard to miss. It'll be on your left as you are walking down.

climbs.name: The Shadows of Those Who Came Before

content.description:
Start on the overlapping flakes. Climb through pockets to the top of the tower. A direct top out is possible, but it is nicer to exit right once reaching the large hueco.

A beautiful line.
content.location: In the alcove behind Rapunzel's Tower. Can be most easily approached from above the boulder with Dan's Problem

content.description: Sit start in the small cave matched on the "octopus" hold. Struggle out of the cave, then break right to jugs and the top.
content.location: On the uphill trailside corner of the boulder that has Dan's Problem and the Brute project. Start in the obvious short cave.

content.description: Start as for Octopus' Garden, matched on the octopus hold in the small cave. Make a few moves to get out of the cave, then break left, following the sloping arete. Top out at the highest point, don't bail early.
Sit start on obvious ledge, reach up for  the sloper then the giant hueco.  Have fun toping out.
content.location: When facing Dans Problem, it's directly behind you, about 10 feet.

climbs.name: Jouney to the Land of Capes, Thongs, and Airbrushed Abs

content.description: Start matched on the sloping rail right above an incut pocket. Pull up and mantel with the use of a few small feet and some wrestling technique. finish up on easier ground.
content.location: Directly opposite Octopus' Garden, on the reddish-hued face.

content.description:
Start sitting with good holds. Make an easy move to a cool pocket hold, then make a tough move over the lip. Head up and left along the arete on some holds that defy logic (some that you swear will break are bulletproof, others that look solid break easily). Top out once you hit the apex of the arete.

Great movement on some of the coolest looking rock around.
content.protection: Pads and spotters. Falls off of this problem can be kinda weird, so pay attention and you'll be fine.
content.location:
Middle Area

Located on the right arete of the obvious overhanging square face seen from the approach trail.

content.description: Start sitting with some slopey stuff at the bottom left side of the Brute face. Traverse the lip of the face up and right, culminating with a committing mantle at the apex of the face.
content.location: Following the left lip of the Brute Face.

content.description:
Start with two slanted crimps at about head height. One hard move gets you to a high left crimp, and then a wild dyno gains you the lip. Awesome climbing with great seats for the peanut gallery.

The sit start still awaits an ascent...
content.location:
Middle Area.

Just left of Dan's Problem.

content.description: Sit start at the obvious jug and make a big first move to a left-hand crimp. Delicately hit a micro edge with your right hand and move  up into the crimps of Brute. Top out!
